content:
# The scan for nearby resource patches confirmed the presence of the same iron ore patch I previously identified:
# - **Name**: Iron Ore
# - **Size**: 10,476
# - **Bounding Box**: 
#   - Left Top: (x=-20.5, y=22.5)
#   - Right Bottom: (x=-11.5, y=29.5)
#   - Center: (x=-16.0, y=26.0)
#
# Since the patch is confirmed to be present, I will now attempt to harvest from a position that is more centrally located within the bounding box of the iron ore patch. 
# This should ensure that I am within the effective harvesting range.

# Moving to a position that is more centrally located within the iron ore resource patch.
central_harvest_position = Position(x=-16.0, y=26.0)  # Center position of the patch.
move_to(central_harvest_position)  # Move to the center of the iron ore patch.
